reviews.review: If you love puzzles that make you feel like a genius, charterers that make you laugh out loud, and a story that is compelling the whole time, play Portal 2. If you haven't played the first, you don't need to play the first to enjoy the second, but I would still recommend playing both just because both are amazing games.
Best Game EVER! You'll never regret to buy it.
get this game on sale for $1 its SO good
Jogo muito bom, que vc perde muitas horas quebrando a cabeça, divertido jogar sozinho e com algum amigo. Super recomendo!!!
Good game, the puzzle solving is fun. Great game.
It's Portal 2. A classic in the same league as the original, Halo, CoD, Age of Empires, or any other essential video game. Do I really have to sell you on this?
Эта игра подойдет для людей любящих головоломки и для тех кто не картошка
я рад что приобрел эту игру
Oui je recommande ce jeu à ma femme
it cool if go in properties enter -console then play and type in noclip so 5 star

Úžasná hra příběhem, hratelností, grafikou a herní dobou.
Zde není co vytknout. Za současnou cenu (8,19€) úžasná koupě a nedělalo by mi problém za ní dát víc.
Wheatley? Wheatley what..? WHEATLEY WHAT ARE YOU DOING?!
Dünyanın en iyi oyunlarından ilk 10 da pp bile portal 2 discord pp bile portal 2 çok iyi bir oyun

Oyun güzel bir oyun. Bulmacaları çok güzel ve bazı bukmacalar beyin yakıyor. Yani baya zor bulmacaları var. Bu oyunda elimizde bir portal silahı var ve bu portal silahıyla böyle sanki kapı gibi böyle iki tane portal açıp bir yerden girip diğer yerden çıkabiliyorsunuz. Oyunun fiyatıda çok pahalı değil. Her indirime girdiğinde 3.70 TL'ye iniyor. Bence indirim olduğunda hemen alın. Aldığınız fiyata değeceğinden eminim. Bu oyuna eskiden saatlerimi harcamıştım. Ama şimdi çok oynamıyorum.
çok temiz oyun. arkadaşlarla veya kendinizin çok eğlenebileceği, sinir krizi geçirebileceği, bol bol küfürde edebileceği güzel bir oyun
Yess this game could not be better, i have beaten it twice, and every single time i played, it was a whole new experince
Its portal 2. Why haven't you played this yet.
nagyon jo kis jatek,el lehet vele lenni
真的很推荐,剧情,可玩性都很好
this game was part of my childhood  and  will always remain a valve classic to me
never played a better game. honest.

17.4h单人剧情通关，传送门yyds。
玩过FPS，玩过益智游戏，但是第一次玩FPS+益智的Portal2真是让人惊喜了：居然有这么有意思的游戏。
好在以前也是4399资深玩家，对益智游戏还是有点心得的，整个单人剧情中只偷看过答案（b站）3次，也算及格了。
我发现社畜玩这个游戏甚至可以领悟在工作中如何有效地解决问题：解谜时首先找到自己的目标，确定要到哪里去；然后充分观察场景里的白墙、凝胶、箱子等工具以及布局，必须细心，只要漏掉一处可能就没办法继续下去；有了目标，有了资源，就可以规划如何解决问题，或脑海中演练，或实践出真知，最终找到问题的最优解。

美中不足的就是小关卡没有编号，不好找攻略啊（狗头
另外这个游戏的剧情全靠机器人AI的美式废话，啰啰嗦嗦一大堆，在专心解密的过程中实在让人心烦。这也是因为Valve的游戏不会给你明说过多内容，而是在各种不起眼的角落提供丰富的剧情碎片，让有心的玩家自行拼凑出一个完整的世界。
这游戏太好玩了，剧情也很好，还是10年前的游戏，到现在都不过时

When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons, what the heck am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man who's gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!
Muito bom jogo de puzzle, precisa de ter em média 200 de QI para terminar, é meio complicado
Really good game my favorite game love how you have to solve puzzles and in the meanwhile you have a great story line.

I love portal 2, I don't play videogames all that much but that's what makes portal 2 beautiful. You don't need to be good at shooters and game experience doesn't help you. It's just a fun time that you can always hop in to, or come back to. I've played it 3 and I'm working on the 4th time right now haha.
Portal here portal there, puzzle completed.
Gameplay, story, and mechanics are all gorgeous!
Хороший футуристический квест. Даже сюжет присутствует. Разик пройти стоит.
porra eh portal ne mano impossivel ser ruim
Valve manages to improve in any sequel! And this ain't any different! ...The quality, not the game itself. Well I guess maybe the game itself--IT'S A GOOD CRUDDING GAME.
Definitely the best game I've ever played. No doubt.

Portal 2 consegue ser uma continuação melhor que o primeiro jogo! Com puzzles mais interessantes, e um modo cooperativo! Se você gostou do primeiro Portal, vai adorar esse jogo e suas mecânicas.

[i]Portal 2[/i] is the same as [i]Portal[/i], but worse.
The gameplay is the exact same, with a few new gimmicks. This is fine, as the first game was perfectly acceptable.

It is impossible to change fov. This is unacceptable in any first person game, especially disappointing considering you could in the first game.
At least one of the puzzles has a softlock, forcing you to reload. It's not hard to do, either. 
Additionally quite a few of the puzzles are obtuse, with solutions so ridiculous it's surprising anyone could beat them without a guide.

The ending is amazing however, unlike the first game.
